policies.description: Require explicit human approval before running package installation commands.
policies.message: Runtime policy requires approval for package installation commands.

policies.description: Allow Safety scans but keep them explicitly monitored in runtime evidence.
policies.message: Runtime policy enabled monitoring for safety tool executions.

policies.description: Block destructive shell commands (rm, chmod, kill) from executing in the runtime sandbox.
policies.message: Destructive shell commands are prohibited by runtime governance policy.

policies.description: Deny outbound network calls to known untrusted or exfiltration-risk domains.
policies.message: Outbound network calls to untrusted exfiltration-risk hosts are blocked.

policies.description: Require approval for outbound POST/PUT requests that could exfiltrate data.
policies.message: Outbound POST/PUT requests require human approval before execution.

policies.description: Block filesystem writes to sensitive system directories.
policies.message: Write/delete operations to sensitive system paths are prohibited.

policies.description: Allow writes to /tmp but flag them for monitoring in compliance evidence.
policies.message: Temporary file writes are permitted but monitored for compliance evidence.
